sense.gloss: to recollect, to remember, to reminisce, to be nostalgic for
to imagine, to guess, to infer
to be brought to mind, to come to mind
gathering to remember a dead person, memorial meeting
to recollect, to remember, to reminisce, to be nostalgic for
to imagine, to guess, to infer

sdata.j: ミサは、↑食↑↓た↓べたり↑飲↑↓の↓んだりしてイエスキリストを↑偲↑↓しの↓ぶカトリックの↑儀式↑↓ぎしき↓だ。
sdata.e: Mass is a Catholic ceremony of remembering Jesus Christ by eating and drinking.

sdata.j: ↑有↑↓あ↓りての↑厭↑↓いと↓い、↑亡↑↓ほろび↓くての↑偲↑↓しの↓び。
sdata.e: The worth of a thing is best known by the want of it.

sdata.j: ↑故人↑↓こじん↓となった↑時↑↓とき↓、みんなからどんな↑風↑↓ふう↓に↑偲↑↓しの↓ばれたいですか？
sdata.e: When you die, what would you like people to remember you as?

words.gloss: to recollect, to remember, to reminisce, to be nostalgic for
to be brought to mind, to come to mind
